key.name: theme
key.description: Use a light or dark variant of GTK. 'default' will attempt to read OS settings on supported platforms.

key.name: show-grid
key.description: Whether to show a grid in the map editor

key.name: show-gradient
key.description: Whether to show a radial gradient in the map editor, visually indicating how far a tile is from the center

key.name: show-cursor-glow
key.description: Whether to show a glow around the currently hovered tile in the map editor
